Description.Text: Ethos Hotel Oxford provides guests with luxuriously styled rooms and suites, affordable service and amenities specifically chosen for the needs of business and pleasure travellers.Situated in the heart of Oxford, a quarter of a mile from Christ Church College, a stay at Ethos Hotel provides guests with a wealth of opportunities, just outside their doorstep. Explore the citys historic sites, enjoy world-class shopping, or relax with a walking tour through Oxford's beautiful Colleges, or along the River Thames, just a few metres from our hotelyour home in Oxford. Attention to detail is considered in everything we do from providing the most comfortable rooms and suites to creating a sustainable, green hotel. Its luxury with a conscience. Ethos Hotel Oxford strikes the perfect balance between home and hotel. Derived from the Greek word meaning a place of living, to us, ethos is the way life should be lived. Live in style. Sustainable living. These are our ethos.Imagine curling up with the softest linens in the most comfortable superking bed. Wake feeling refreshed, rejuvenated and ready for whatever your day has to offer. One Rate, No Add-Ons:Complimentary Wi-Fi Broadband Complimentary Sky Movies, Sports, Kids Complimentary breakfast basket delivered to your room or suite Complimentary access to Oxford's premier private members' club Reduced rates to a nearby spa, gym & pool Complimentary local & national calls (to limit)Other Hotel Features: Quiet location, within a few minutes walk to the city centre Nearby park, adventure playground, tennis, golf, boating lake and summer time heated outdoor poolIndividually styled rooms Air-conditioning Adjoining rooms with connecting doors and two-storey SkyLoft Suite provide a quiet room and a relaxing retreat Extra bed and cots Direct dial phones and voicemail Desk with ample power pointsDaily maid service Laundry and dry-cleaning serviceMulti-lingual staff

Ethos Hotel Oxford is located in a quiet location within a few minutes walk to the city centre, with its historic pubs, bistros and restaurants that feature a variety of settings and styles to suit any pocket.There is free street parking close to the hotel. Ethos Hotel is perfectly situated to give guests of all ages easy access to Oxford's beauty. Just a few metres from Grandpont Nature Park, South Oxford Adventure Playground, the Green Flag Award-winning Hinksey Park and the Thames Path National Trail, the hotel can provide maps and directions for walks along the river. A few metres from the hotel is a public footbridge across the River Thames to Westgate Shopping Centre.Oxford is is the closest city to London and is centrally located in England, close to the Cotswolds, making it an ideal base for exploring the country. Known as the City of Dreaming Spires, Oxford is famous the world over for its university and history.

Deluxe Room (Super King Size Bed or 2 over-sized Twin Beds) - Individually styled, the Deluxe Rooms are larger than Superior and contain either a superking size bed with a pillow-top mattress or two over-size twin beds, with a power shower over bath, and come equipped with all of the In-Room Amenities.
Luxury Room with Super King Size Bed - Stylish and contemporary, the stunning Luxury Rooms, with superking size bed, maximise personal space so that whether you are working, relaxing, or sleeping your Ethos experience is synonymous with home. The Luxury Rooms also come equipped with all of the In-Room Amenities.
Luxury Sky Loft 2-storey Suite - The SkyLoft is an spacious two-storey suite containing a living room with a comfortable sofabed, travertine marble bathroom, bathrobes, slippers, and an upper storey with a superking bed, large LCD TV and stunning views of the city and spires - the ultimate space in Oxford for relaxation, entertainment or work. The SkyLoft comes equipped with all of the In-Room Amenities.
Superior Guest Room with King Size Bed - The Superior Rooms contain a king-size bed, desk space, as well as a travertine marble shower room with power shower, as well as all of the In-Room Amenities.
